summary.para: Exposes methods that get and set the parent and the parent's child ID. While IParentAndItem is typically implemented on IShellItems, it is not specific to .

remarks.para: The performance improvement using this interface can be noted in comparison with , an interface that uses absolute item identifier lists. Subsequent operations on objects that implement IPersistIDList may require calls, and these calls may impact performance. In the case of IShellItems and participating IShellFolders that implement IParentAndItem, the parent may already be cached. By implementing IParentAndItem and then getting/setting the parent IShellFolder directly, the call to IShellFolder.BindToObject on the item identifier list to retrieve the IShellFolder interface is eliminated.
